## Code and data

- [`nematode_global`](https://gitlab.ethz.ch/devinrouth/crowther_lab_nematodes), data and code used for our study on global biogeographic patterns of soil nematodes.
- [`nematode_volume`](https://github.com/hooge104/nematode_volume_calculations), calculating the volume of the world's soil nematodes. In total, there are `1337.603` Billion cans of worms on the planet.
- [`color_palettes`](https://hooge104.github.io/color_palettes.html), selected color palettes that could be useful for geospatial mapping projects.
- [`future_cities`](https://github.com/hooge104/future_cities), a `Shiny` app showing the future climates of world's major cities.
- [`preprint_layout`](https://github.com/hooge104/preprint_template_latex), to create basic documents in `LaTeX`.
